alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Montgomery; Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 10:51AM CST until January 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...A mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to a quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Temperatures may briefly rise above freezing this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Iowa and southeast Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Thursday. The heaviest precipitation will fall from now through 8 PM. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel will be quite hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
